title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
created_time: June 16, 2022, 09:47:38 AMLast edit: June 19, 2022, 08:17:01 PM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: Dear BTCitcointalk members,Hard Times create Strong Members.To put a little balm in the heart, and to thank this wonderful community for being still active despite the crash, here is the Alpen Coin "Bear-Market Blues" free Raffle."Bear-Market Blues LOT"1 x 500,000 Satoshi Alpen Coin silver plated bar. (serial number to be defined)1 x Alpen Coin BITCOIN ONLY CAPShipping fees: paid by the winner (yes we are in a bear-market)RULES- Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)- Requirements: Jr Member and up . newbie needs at least 2 merits to participate (if you have purchased an Alpen Coin Collectible and have not 2 merits, you are in). if you are a newbie, but can show proof of activity on the forum, you can take a spot.- Last number of the hash of that block I choose will be the winner.LIST:00 - sam0001 - heisty02 - Steeley03 - FattCatt 04 - Spokanistan5105 - 5tift06 - TopTort77707 - Remsjack08 - Buchi-8809 - Real-Duke10 - Pmalek11 - Yoda12 - GazetaBitcoin13 - HeRetiK14 - ChiBitCTy15 - Thiago00716 -
